barInfo.description: 开放自由的类贴吧式留言板

list.author: 孙天骁
list.content:
"controller": {
    "prefix": "controller",
    "body": [
      "const BaseController = require('../base/BaseController');",
      "",
      "class ${1:Index}Controller extends BaseController {",
      "",
      "}",
      "",
      "module.exports = ${1:Index}Controller;",
      "",
    ],
    "description": "生成 Astroboy 控制器代码",
  },
  "service": {
    "prefix": "service",
    "body": [
      "const BaseService = require('../base/BaseService');",
      "",
      "class ${1:Index}Service extends BaseService {",
      "  get SERVICE_NAME() {",
      "    return '${1:Index}';",
      "  }",
      "",
      "  async ${2:method}(params) {",
      "    return this.invoke('${2:method}', params);",
      "  }",
      "}",
      "",
      "module.exports = ${1:Index}Service;",
    ],
    "description": "生成 Astroboy 服务代码"
  },
  "service async": {
    "prefix": "sasync",
    "body": [
      "async ${1:method}(params) {",
      "  return this.invoke('${1:method}', params);",
      "}",
    ],
    "description": "生成服务async"
  }

threadInfo.author: 孙天骁
threadInfo.title: 备份一点vscode 代码片段
